## R Markdown


```{r}
real_estate<-read.csv("Real estate.csv", header=TRUE)
real_estate<-real_estate[,-1]
real_estate <- real_estate[complete.cases(real_estate),]

names(real_estate)[1]<-"transaction_date"
names(real_estate)[2]<-"house_age"
names(real_estate)[3]<-"distance_to_the_nearest_MRT_station"
names(real_estate)[4]<-"number_of_convenience_stores"
names(real_estate)[5]<-"latitude"
names(real_estate)[6]<-"longitude"
names(real_estate)[7]<-"house_price_of_unit_area"


real_estate <- real_estate[order(real_estate$latitude,real_estate$longitude),]
summary(real_estate)
estate.lm<-lm(house_price_of_unit_area ~ transaction_date + house_age + distance_to_the_nearest_MRT_station + number_of_convenience_stores + latitude + longitude,data=real_estate)

summary(estate.lm)

estate2.lm<-lm(house_price_of_unit_area ~ transaction_date + house_age + distance_to_the_nearest_MRT_station + number_of_convenience_stores + latitude, data=real_estate)
summary(estate2.lm)
```
